summary: This mod adds 20 more argonians to the base Skyrim continent.  Each of these argonians are unique and are spread throughout the province. The majority are marriage candidates.  No DLC required
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 20 more argonians to the base Skyrim continent.  Each of these argonians are unique and are spread throughout the province.  Below are a list of each of them and where you might find them:

Dark Brotherhood

Deeth-Meefus Augeesmesh - She is a member of the Dawnstar Sanctuary (can marry)

Jeetum-Shei Peridorus - He is a member of the Dawnstar Sanctuary (can marry)

Kynesgrove

Geeacles Andreerean - He is a bard at the inn (can marry)

Keeht Careegoulus - She is a guard

Marrava Canilus - She is an adventurer staying at the inn (can marry)

Okutvee Xemmean - She is a mercenary for hire at the inn (can marry)

Riften

Deemukeeus Careessius - He is a member of the Thieves Guild (can marry)

Drujalg Andreethees - She is a member of the Thieves Guild (can marry)

Solitude

Deehare Xersareth - He is a member of the Bards College (can marry)

Hal-Ja Theoseus - She is a member of the Bards College (can marry)

Whiterun

Bun-Dar Caymean - He is a member of the Companions (can marry)

Sheer-Leesha Casnaresh - She is a member fo the Companions (can marry)

Windhelm

Shallg Tiberdeseer - She is a beggar outside of the Assemblage (can marry)

Mush-Kilaya Augeesssius - He is a mercenary for hire outside of Assemblage (can marry)

Ushnicin Lafnes - He is a city guard that patrols the Assemblage

Weelz'k Pernes - He is a beggar outside of the Assemblage (can marry)

Winterhold

Erh-Nefeus Theomuseeth - She is a member of both the College of Winterholds and Solitude's Bards College (can marry)

Meech-Mena Nagmareen - She is a member of the College of Winterhold (can marry)

Reesnee Theoleesh - He is a member of the College of Winterhold (can marry)

Sissnee Canimarush - He is a member of the College of Winterhold staying at the Inn (can marry)


Changelog:
V1:
-The initial release.
V1.1:
-Changed the location of the Riften adventurer to Kynesgrove.
-Changed the adventurer's voice type so you can have her as a follower.

Known Bugs:
None at this time

Note:
Some voices will not sound Argonian due to basic Bethesda limitations.

Credits:
Argonian Name Generator - http://fantasynamegenerators.com/argonian_names.php


Follow me on Facebook for updates: [url=https://www.facebook.com/ArronDominionProductions/]Arron Dominion Productions[/url]
author: Arron Dominion

files.name: Dominions More Argonians v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Riften adventurer is now located in Kynesgrove
The adventurer's voice type was changed so she could be a follower
